plants.name: Aloe Vera
plants.description: A succulent plant known for its medicinal properties and easy maintenance.

plants.name: Spider Plant
plants.description: A popular houseplant with long, arching leaves and small plantlets.

plants.name: Snake Plant
plants.description: Also known as Sansevieria, this plant is known for its upright leaves and air-purifying qualities.

plants.name: Peace Lily
plants.description: A flowering plant that thrives in low light and helps purify indoor air.

plants.name: Bamboo Palm
plants.description: A tropical plant with feathery leaves, ideal for creating a lush indoor atmosphere.
